Speaker: Megaera
Text: My sisters and I. We've had a chance to talk, and we have come to an agreement, Zagreus. As you can see.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Three against one. Doesn't seem all that sporting, now, does it?

Speaker: Megaera
Text: We're each well past the need for any sport. We'll kill you, whatever it takes. Erinyes! *Now*.

Speaker: Megaera
Text: Heads up, Tisiphone. I think I found a murderer for you.

Description: Fury 3 Sister Union Single Sis 01 A
Speaker: Alecto
Text: You mess with Tis, redblood, you mess with me, get it?

Description: Fury 3 Sister Union Single Sis 01 A
Speaker: Tisiphone
Zagreus
Text: Hey, you must be one of Meg's sisters! Nice to finally meet you. My name's Zagreus. Not *Murderer*. Definitely not.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: *Erm*... look, I've done some things that maybe aren't great, but I am very, very sure I haven't murdered anyone.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: I'm here on official business this time, Tisiphone, so, *uh*... stand aside! Although, I guess the whole point of this job is that you're meant to try and stop me anyway, isn't that right?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Oh, sorry that you couldn't make the feast back at the House, Tisiphone. Though, I don't really think it was your kind of scene. Although, Ares was there, he's probably done some murders, right?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: *Erm*... how about, no? No murder. No murder!

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: I was really hoping we could change the subject. Please?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Let me guess. Murder? Murderer, perhaps? One of those two.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Please, I'm not a murderer, you don't have to do this.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: We're not getting through to one another, are we. I'm sorry that it has to be this way.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: I don't understand. But I'm not who you think I am. My father sent you to stop me, that's all.

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: No, murder. Zagreus. My name is Zagreus! Can you say that, Tisiphone? No murder. *Zagreus*!

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: You really did say *murderzer*, didn't you! That's progress! Zagreus! I'm Zagreus, I'm not a murderer! Can you say Zagreus?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Do you remember me, Tisiphone? My name is Zagreus. Prince of the Underworld? Pretty close with Megaera, I guess. Try saying Zagreus again for me?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Oh, you're so close, Tisiphone! Remember, Zagreus? That's me. I'm not your enemy, you know, don't you know that? I'm only Zagreus!

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: No. Wait. Just the first part. No murderer. Just Zagreus. Or... let's see, how about... *happy*? Can you say *happy*?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: *Erm*, well... let's try again with *happy*, how about that? Happy? No murder, only happy. Come on, now!

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: *Eugh*, I guess the *happy *thing just isn't doing it for you. Though, maybe trying to kill me like this is as close as you can get. You learned my name at least, that's something, right?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: ...Then we're back to square one. Look, I was just trying to get through to you with all the Zagreus and happy stuff. But, if you can understand any of this, Tisiphone, I think you're all right, just the way you are. Friends?

Speaker: Zagreus
Text: Hey, *uhh*, any second thoughts, by any chance, about the whole *happy *thing? Just making sure.
